Text: thanks for this. i bought the album on release day in australia then discovered it was being released with all these great extra tracks in the US...9 months later. fkn great album, it deserves to go down as a landmark album in pop music for the 2010's.
after listening to this, it sounds like a re-encode of the itunes mp3s/m4as. sound quality isn't great. :/
It is an ITUNES RIP, which means I have converted the original m4a. files into mp3 files. This decrease the quality a bit and increase the size a bit.
